value.0: The eyes of the decapitated troll chieftain seem to follow you from within their sunken sockets. Even though you were sure to sear the neck stump over the campfire, the thought of it somehow regenerating within your pack still haunts you. You can't wait to find Lenton and leave the accursed thing on his doorstop in exchange for his promised reward.
